alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 6:04AM CST until January 12 at 6:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 630 AM CST. * At 604 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Holly Grove, or 12 miles south of Clarendon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Holly Grove... Palmer... Pine City... Lawrenceville... Ragtown... Crocketts Bluff... Louisiana Purchase State Park... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
